messages: 3c61282fb76a19cc666f8c461778a5d5 (17:54): i curl availiable by default on mac osx?
ba198afc3b2df6f59271f6d90a9d0f8c (17:55): GlaDiaC: curl is installed by default, yes
3c61282fb76a19cc666f8c461778a5d5 (17:56): hjst: could it be easily installed?
ba198afc3b2df6f59271f6d90a9d0f8c (17:56): you could compile it yourself, or use macports or fink (both package managers)
ba198afc3b2df6f59271f6d90a9d0f8c (17:57): not by default, but it's in macports
ba198afc3b2df6f59271f6d90a9d0f8c (17:58): you can search the fink package repo here: http://pdb.finkproject.org/pdb/index.php?phpLang=en
ba198afc3b2df6f59271f6d90a9d0f8c (17:59): I think fink puts stuff in /sw
ba198afc3b2df6f59271f6d90a9d0f8c (18:00): obviously anything you do yourself will be in /usr/local
3c61282fb76a19cc666f8c461778a5d5 (18:00): is there pkg-config availiable on mac?
3c61282fb76a19cc666f8c461778a5d5 (18:02): hjst: I'm migrating WengoPhone to cmake (new build system) and I need to know where the paths are on macosx, cause I don't own one
ba198afc3b2df6f59271f6d90a9d0f8c (18:03): GlaDiaC: I see - I don't know about pkg-config
ba198afc3b2df6f59271f6d90a9d0f8c (18:03): it's just C though right? it'll probably compile
ba198afc3b2df6f59271f6d90a9d0f8c (18:03): "pkg-config works on multiple platforms: Linux and other UNIX-like operating systems, Mac OS X and Windows."
ba198afc3b2df6f59271f6d90a9d0f8c (18:05): well, on my system with macports, a 'locate libssl' shows these:
ba198afc3b2df6f59271f6d90a9d0f8c (18:07): gah! i HATE that safari doesn't ask you to confirm the quit command when W is right next to Q on the keyboard
ba198afc3b2df6f59271f6d90a9d0f8c (18:08): GlaDiaC: there is no /opt/lib on my machine
ba198afc3b2df6f59271f6d90a9d0f8c (18:08): if you want to ask more specific questions, you could try #macports - they should be able to tell you more about lib paths etc.
